summary:
• Over 17 years of an experience in J2EE work area
• Strong programming skills
• Strong management and communication skills (managed 12+ teams of developers/QA)
• Started programming at an early age
• Enjoy math and science as much as programming
• Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science (5 years of study)
• Team player — able to listen to the opinion of colleagues, and contribute constructive criticism where needed.
• Work with different projects using a wide range of technology for various domains: insurance, consultancy, government, management and etc.
• Knowledge and manage full cycle of the development process, from customer demands to ready-to-use software
• Technical education (artificial Intelligence specialty)
• Self-motivated, reliable

Experience in: Java 8,11, Angular 6, JavaScript, GCP (BigQuery, Memorystore (Redis), App Engine, etc), Kafka, Avro, Protobuf, Docker, Microservices, Spring, Spring Boot, J2EE, S3, AWS, NoSQL (Cassandra, MongoDB, Firestore, etc) and RDBMS (PostgresSQL, MySQL, etc), Maven, SQL, HTML, jQuery, Bootstrap, Rest, Selenium, Seam, JSF, RichFaces, Facelets, Ajax, JSP, XML, Hibernate,  Spring MVC, Jasper Report, HQL, CQL, CSS, Spring Web Flow, Tiles, JSP, Spring Aspect, Spring Integration, Sphinx Search (http://sphinxsearch.com/), etc
Strongest skills: web development, architecture, project management
Specialties: senior software developer, software architect, technical leader, team leader.

school.name: Belarusian State University of Informatics and Radioelectronics

certifications.name: Data Engineering on Google Cloud Platform, a 5-course specialization by Google Cloud on Coursera
Serverless Machine Learning with Tensorflow on Google Cloud Platform
Leveraging Unstructured Data with Cloud Dataproc on Google Cloud Platform
Serverless Data Analysis with Google BigQuery and Cloud Dataflow
Google Cloud Platform Big Data and Machine Learning Fundamentals

projects.title: Lanit GMU
projects.description:
Official site of Russian Federation for publishing information about state (municipal) organizations and institutions  http://bus.gov.ru 
The system can be divided into two main parts: 
- The public part is available for any internet user, contains developed searching instruments and analytical tools;
- The private part is designed for authorized  users, the representatives of state(municipal) organizations and  institutions. 
Since 2012 each state (municipal) institution of Russian Federation has to provide information about the institution and its activities on bus.gov.ru.  Just open that link above, to discover what that information about, to look at analytics data, etc.
Project was developed from the very beginning up to the production. We covered all parts of the development process. 


Position:	Lead Java Developer, Team lead
Responsibilities:	Managing development team (estimation, allocation planning, managing project infrastructure). Implementation functionality in accord with specification. Tuning database and application performance. Bug fixing. Analytical and architectural problem solving. Code review. Junior team members mentoring.
Technical Summary:	Spring, Spring MVC, JSP, Oracle DB, Web Sphere Application Server, Servlets, JSTL, IBM WAS, Crypto-Pro/JCP, JQuery

projects.title: Lanit PGZ
projects.description:
The subject development is a subsystem of keeping a register of contracts, which is a subsystem of the application software "All-Russian official Internet site for posting information about placing orders for goods, works and services for federal needs, the needs of the Russian Federation or municipal needs. That site is available now by following internet address: http://www.zakupki.gov.ru/
Position: Lead Java Developer, Team lead
Responsibilities:	Managing development team (estimation, allocation planning, managing project infrastructure). Implementation functionality in accord with specification. Tuning database and application performance. Bug fixing.
Technical Summary: Spring, Spring Web Flow, JSF, ICE Faces, Oracle DB, Web Sphere Application Server, JSP, Servlets, JSTL, IBM WAS, JProfiler

profile_positions.description: Single-handedly designed and implemented a web-based analytics platform that allows the data science, marketing, and mobile development teams to access and analyze key marketing metrics such as lifetime value (LTV) for advertising, lifetime value for subscription, average revenue per daily active user (ARPDAU), revenue, and retention for mobile apps. This enables them to adjust their marketing campaigns and development strategies accordingly.
profile_positions.title: Technical Lead

profile_positions.description:
I am the sole architect and developer of the server component of this multiplayer game. Players can compete with friends or other players. I am fully responsible for the development and maintenance of the server component in production. 
In addition, I have developed all of the algorithms for creating crossword puzzles in the game for both player vs. environment (PVE) and player vs. player (PVP) modes.
profile_positions.title: Technical Lead

profile_positions.description:
Project:
These is a big data system in a security domain to process and manage sensitive government data.

Responsibilities:
I have developed the core functionality. I have introduced for the team and implemented TDD approach. I have found and fixed crucial bugs before running into production.  
I have developed many Flink job to process data across systems.
I have developed microservices to help with image recognition and text translation, that were packed in docker containers.
I have developed microservices to work with Elastic and Postgres and S3, to have possibility to search all data files in a system and download it when it needed. 


Technical Summary:
Java 8, Kafka, Hadoop, Yarn, Apache Beam, Apache Flink, Avro, Protobuf, etc

I developed the web application https://voc.guru by myself from scratch  to memorize as many as possible English words.

Adaptive design, it works for mobile and desktop.

profile_positions.title: voc.guru (owner)

profile_positions.description:
Project: Pinsight RTB
The project is a SSP and DSP system (advertising area). The project should work in high load multi-threaded environment with an excellent performance. The project is implemented OpenRTB specification.

Responsibilities:
Develop the core of the application, algorithm and logic to work as SSP and DSP, implementing second price auction functionality. 
Design and build RESTful APIs for internal and external system.
Participating in developing core of the system. Implementing support for video creative. Integration with other SSP adn DSP, for example, Mopub, Smaato, Vdopia, Rubicon, etc.
Developed the web GUI to manage business data for different application role.
TTD: write integration tests and write module for automation selenium testing.

Technical Summary:
Java 8, Big Data, Cassandra, Angular,  Grunt, Maven, Selenium, NoSQL, Jersey, JBoss, GIT, JavaScript, Html, CSS, Bootstrap, Rest, Json, etc
profile_positions.title: Senior Java Developer

profile_positions.description:
Project: zakupki.gov.ru
	The main goal of the project is a fight against corruption. 
The private business can use the project to find a government tender/contract. Try to participate and win tender.
The ordinary man can use the project to control government. For example, participate in discussion for the biggest tenders/contract.
Also site provides a lot of other useful information about banks, organization, government inspection, analytic information, etc.

Responsibilities: 
I'm a team leader of the project. I have a wide range of responsibilities: 
	- developing crucial part of project 
	- manage project: work with the developers, make and assign them tasks, work with the QA, customers and analytics
	- communication with a customer
	- estimating software costs in man hours new subsystem of the project and change requests
	- etc.

Briefly I cover all processes that start when you get draft of document with description of new subsytem till ready-to-use that subsystem on server.

I'm expert in that system. I have knowledge about all different aspect of the project:
	- architecture layers of software and communication between layers
	- project design
	- module structure
	- database structure
	- version control, production release, hot fix on the server
	- how the search engine works
	- how to build and deploy project
	- how to write new module
	etc.

Technical Summary: MSProject, Sphinx, Spring, Spring MVC, jQuery, Ajax, Tiles, Hibernate, Oracle,  Maven, JAXB, CSS, HTML, JavaScript, XML, etc
profile_positions.title: Team Leader / Senior Java Developer

profile_positions.description:
Project: http://bus.gov.ru 
That web-project provides official information about all government organizations and institutions. 

The system can be divided into two main parts: 
- The public part is available for any internet user, contains advanced search and analytical tools;
- The private part is designed for authorized users, for users, which are the representatives of state organizations and institutions. 

Since 2012 each state organization of Russian Federation must to provide information about the itself and its activities on http://bus.gov.ru.  Just open that link to discover what that information about, to look at analytics data, etc. 

Responsibilities:
I was responsible for developing architecture and coding the whole private part of an application (except user registration and login). I together with my team have done a lot of work for 4 month and launch application into production since 1 January 2012.

Since March 2012 I’m Team Leader of that project. Mine responsibilities become wider and include: estimate new functionality, control work load of each member of the team, communication with a customer, deliver new functionality in time and with good quality of product and etc.

Technical Summary: 
Spring, Spring MVC, jQuery, Ajax, Tiles, Hibernate, Oracle,  Maven, JAXB, CSS, HTML, JavaScript, XML, etc
profile_positions.title: Senior Java Developer

profile_positions.description:
Project: Mozido

Mozido is a leading provider of low-cost, white-labeled multi-channel financial services (“mFS”) for mobile network operators, financial institutions and retailers. For more information http://www.mozido.com/about 
Project is a set of web-services, which allow perform different kind of financial operations. You can found it on web site of company, for instance, Money Transfer,  Pay Bills, Buy & Transfer Airtime, Retail Purchases, Check Balances, etc.
Aim of team of Artezio was improve existed project architecture, improve performance and reliability of financial services, fix existed bottlenecks, find and fix possible bottlenecks, etc.

Responsibilities: I designed and implemented new architecture approach for the existing code. Implemented new financial services based on new approach. Support and bug fix.

Technical Summary: Spring, JPA, AMQP, RabbitMQ, Spring Integration, ActiveMQ, Web Services, JMS,  Soap UI, etc
profile_positions.title: Architect / Senior Java Developer

profile_positions.description:
Project: Lanit PGZ
The main goal of the project is fight against corruption. For that purpose Artezio as part of Lanit Group are developed system that make public all government contract and tenders for business and ordinary citizen. Try it: zakupki.gov.ru

Responsibilities: In close connection with a customer I as part of the team developed a web-application, where government organization and business can input information about their contracts. All information about contracts is available to the public.

I was responsible for communication with a customer and development client/server part of application (web/server/database layer), tuning performance of application and etc.

Technical Summary: Spring, Spring Web Flow, JSF, ICE Faces, Oracle DB, Web Sphere Application Server, JSP, Servlets, JSTL, IBM WAS, JProfiler
profile_positions.title: Senior Java Developer

profile_positions.description:
Project: Make Compliancy
KWA is a consulting company that provides services for its' customer in oil, energy, noise, quality, air, environmental, safety and water quality areas (www.kwa.nl). We developed the quality and compliance management system Make 
(www.make-online.nl). Make is a web java application, that works on JBoss Server. The application has a modular structure. The delivery configuration depends on customers preferences. The application is used now by over 10 customers like Heineken,  TheoPauw, Erasmus MC, Prorail. The application consists of over 800 classes, more than 600 webpages.

Position: Architect / Senior Java Developer

Responsibilities:
I have been a key team member from the beginning till launch into production. 
I designed and implemented the core library based on Seam technology that allows for very fast creation of the entity view form and the entity list view. It helped us to save a lot of time for the project. The functionality ended up in two separate libraries for java and web.
I contributed to the architecture and improved the development process in several ways.
I was responsible for the release and configuration management and deployment to the remote server. 
I developed a close working relationship with the customer, wrote description for the new functionality, assign that functionality for implementation, and validated the progress inside the Agile sprint.

Technical Summary:
Seam, JSF, Hibernate, RichFaces, Facelets, Ajax, CSS, HTML, JavaScript etc
profile_positions.title: Technical Leader / Senior Java Developer

profile_positions.description:
Project: Exigen MyDocuments 
The project gives possibility to create different types of documents; to manage document state; to search document and etc. Implemented functionality has many common features like a JIRA project.

Responsibilities:
- Design and implement functionality to navigate in documents structure.
- Design and implement functionality to work with attachments of document.
- Design and implement functionality to search documents by name, author and etc (including full text search).

Technical Summary: Seam, JSF, RichFaces, Facelets

Project: Exigen Workspace Services 
Main goal of project is a development of a platform that allows creation of enterprise web applications with minimum time and resource effort. That is a framework based on Seam with a Exigen Specific Requirement such as integration with a Exigen JCR, Exigen BPM and etc. 

Responsibilities: 
- Develop design and implement functionality to work with a dictionary. Dictionary is a limited value set of data. For example: it might be any lookup dictionary, that defines in a ACORD Life Standards specification (http://www.acord.org).
- Extend RichFaces functionality to work with a list of business data on UI. 
- Develop design and implement functionality to define, create and manage application events uses  XML, Java code or Seam Page Flow in a web application environment.
- Development Maven plugin, that automates work to release application builds.
Etc.

Technical Summary: Seam, JSF, RichFaces, Facelets, Hibernate
profile_positions.title: Senior Java Developer

profile_positions.description:
Project: New York Life Insurance Company

Import Utility is intended to simplify OLTP database and Operational Data Storage replication and bring the data integration on the application user layer.  The recurrent data load can simply create or update existing business information in CRM system. The idea is to make importing data a fairly easy end-user function. 
FormLetter and WebMail modules are intended to provide mass email sending capability to prospective customers and leads. This is a fairly useful tool for any kind of special events notification by one click.

Responsibilities:
Design and implementation Import Utility, a part of the mass import (third-party data integration sub-system). 
- Enhancement/re-design/re-factoring FormLetter and WebMail modules. Experience in integration between web services, JavaMail and heavy client side ajax-style custom components include java script wrappers for third party ActiveX and VB components.
- Participation in Policy module development according to the business requirements (mainly persistence layer and business logic), include: third party operation data storage integration, data propagation, OLTP data replication and so on.

Technical Summary: Java, JavaScript, Hibernate 3.1.3, Spring Framework 1.2.9, Quartz

Project: Mass Mutual Life Insurance Company
Adapt existent CRM application to customers’ business processes and implementation additional functionality.

Responsibilities:
- Customization module for MassMutual external system. Improve functionality and performance of this module.
- Development module that works in wireless network with the main application on Blackberry device.
- Development and implementation of the module that works with Oracle Core-id identity server (third party authentication/authorization service) integration.

Technical Summary:
Java, JavaScript,J2EE, Servlets, JSP, JDBC, Hibernate 3.1.3, Spring Framework 1.2.9, JasperReports, Tapestry 3.0.4, DB Unit testing
profile_positions.title: Java Developer

profile_positions.description:
Project: Colina Imperial Insurance Company
This import module plugs in to main CRM application and is necessary to import business data from external system. Customization of this module for Colina Imperial provides import data from DB2 Database to Agility MSSQL Database. Features: validating data integrity during import; generate statistics; run import by schedule.

Responsibilities: Development and implementation the import module

Technical Summary: Spring Framework 1.2.9, JasperReports, DB Unit testing, Java

Project: Bankers Life Insurance Company
Adapt existent CRM application to customers’ business processes

Responsibilities: 
Development and implementation java classes, JSP, persistence, business logic and presentation layer. DB Oracle.

Technical Summary: J2EE, Servlets, JSP, JDBC
